body:
What this is, is pretty much just 2 people picking one of the Battles from ERB and someone will play it they choose there "Rapper" and they have to rap there parts.

Prizes will be negotiated when a winner is chosen.

Winner is decided by the other people in the Channel, (NO BIAS PLS).

You can challenge anyone but they have to be able to come there.

*Looking for someone that would be able to play it with good quality, my speakers and soundbored are not working right now :(

Hopefully this will work out :D

P.S this will be in 1 hour (You can practice) [MUSIC ROOM ON TS]-ts.avicus.net
